channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0112; 01:48AM; 1765 N Vista Del Mar Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3yLEFV2" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3yLEFV2</a>; #Hollywood; 32 Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames within a small abandoned and vacant two-story apartment building, that was well involved with fire on LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E227 E235 E27 E41 E447 RA82 RA827 T27 T35; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0112; 01:29AM; 1765 N Vista Del Mar Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3yLEFV2" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3yLEFV2</a>; #Hollywood; PRELIM: Small abandoned two-story apartment building well involved with fire. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E227 E235 E27 E41 E447 RA82 RA827 T27 T35; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Railcar Fire; INC#0030; 01:20AM; 5222 E Valley Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4aT1O5h" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4aT1O5h</a>; #ElSereno; 32 LAFD Firefighters took 54 minutes to secure the Union Pacific freight train and adjacent active railroad tracks, access, confine and fully extinguish burning contents within two adjacent (upper and lower) intermodal cargo containers in a double-stack configuration. The contents of both cars are ordinary combustibles, identified as automotive parts, such as seating components. No injury. No structures threatened. No off-site hazard identified. Media Inquiries: Union Pacific Railroad. ; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 BC775 E1 E16 E201 E202 E47 RA47 RA801 T1 T2; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Railcar Fire; INC#0030; 12:26AM; 5222 E Valley Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4aT1O5h" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4aT1O5h</a>; #ElSereno; PRELIM: Freight train with two cargo containers on fire. Undetermined contents. No Structure Threat. No Injury. No Off-Site Hazard Identified.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 BC775 E1 E16 E201 E202 E47 RA47 RA801 T1 T2; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Structure Fire; INC#0869; 01:27PM; 1226 W 37th Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wVLvqI" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wVLvqI</a>; #ExpositionPark; 51 LAFD Firefighters took just 31 minutes to access, confine and largely extinguish heavy fire in a 1,834 square foot two-story home, preventing intense flames from extending to a two-story home to the east. No injury. The involved residence, built in 1909, was heavily damaged and suffered partial structural collapse from the fire, leading to the extended effort still underway to fully extinguish concealed smoldering debris. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E13 E15 E203 E215 E26 E46 RA15 RA246 RA34 RA815 SO1 SQ21 T15 T3; CH9; 13 15; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0869; 12:56PM; 1226 W 37th Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wVLvqI" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wVLvqI</a>; #ExpositionPark; PRELIM: Two-story home well involved, threatening one or more adjacent homes. ; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 BC13 E13 E15 E203 E215 E26 E46 RA15 RA246 RA815 SQ21 T15 T3; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0153; 03:36AM; 3542 E 3rd St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/45itcIP" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/45itcIP</a>; #BoyleHeights; Firefighters responded to a one-story row-of-commercials with heavy fire showing. Crews used defensive firefighting tactics (from the exterior only) and set up ladder pipes and other heavy streams to attack the fire. The first 30 firefighters extinguished the flames in just 19 minutes. Crews will remain on scene for an extended period of time to chase down hidden hot spots and overhaul the building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E25 E3 E4 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA25 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T1 T10 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0153; 03:17AM; 3539 E 3rd St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RdtECs" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RdtECs</a>; #BoyleHeights; One-story row of commercials with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E25 E3 E4 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA25 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T1 T10 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1900; 11:34PM; 1107 E 118th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VazNAz" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VazNAz</a>; #GreenMeadows; Firefighters responded to a one-story single-family home with heavy smoke showing. Crews made entry with hose lines and discovered heavy fire in the attic. Firefighters ventilated (cut holes in) the roof to allow the heavy smoke to escape, while firefighters below made access through the ceiling to extinguish the flames in 19 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC13 E21 E221 E233 E264 E33 E65 EM13 RA264 RA64 RA65 RA864 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Auto Rollover with Entrapment; INC#1835; 10:20PM; EB 118 Fwy x 210 Fwy; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4e69F2h" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4e69F2h</a>; #Pacoima; Firefighters responded to the scene of a multi-vehicle collision, with rollover and entrapment, resulting in three people needing medical aid. Crews extricated two trapped victims from the wreckage, using hydraulic rescue tools. Both trapped patients were transported to a nearby trauma center in critical condition. A third patient was transported in moderate condition. CHP Log #2723. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E91 E98 EM15 RA75 RA91 RA98 T75 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
